sentences: In Section II.D of the decision (FCCC/AWGLCA/2011/L.4), the COP, inter alia: agrees to continue considering a general framework for cooperative sectoral approaches and sector-specific actions with a view to adopting a decision on this matter at COP 18; requests that SBSTA 36 consider issues relating to agriculture; and agrees to continue consideration of issues related to addressing emissions from international aviation and maritime transport.
